CheckTitle: Check if critical PII exists in CloudWatch logs.
Description: Check if critical Personally Identifiable Information (PII) exists in CloudWatch logs.
Risk: Storing critical PII in CloudWatch logs could expose sensitive personal data, leading to privacy violations or unauthorized access to systems. This could also violate compliance with privacy regulations.

Recommendation.Text: It is recommended that critical PII is not logged to CloudWatch logs. Sensitive data should either be excluded or masked using a protection policy.
